title: How does the change in KE compare

content.question: As the crate slides a distance d, how does the new gain in kinetic energy compare to ∆K?

choices.label: The new gain is greater than ∆K.
The new gain is less than ∆K
The new gain is equal to ∆K.
The new gain is greater or less than ∆K depending on the value of θ

content.answer: The new gain is less than ∆K

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
